TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SessionStateModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule, class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateModule
Public NotInheritable Class SessionStateModule Implements ISessionStateModule
type SessionStateModule = class interface ISessionStateModule interface IHttpModule

summary.span: Provides session-state services for an application.

span.span: Provides session-state services for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ASP。NET 的預設工作階段狀態的處理常式。 is ASP.NET's default session-state handler. 它會將工作階段資料寫入，並擷取工作階段狀態存放區並引發**Session_OnStart**並**Session_OnEnd**事件。It writes session data to and retrieves it from the session-state store and raises the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events. 如需如何使用 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態儲存和擷取值，使用者工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For details about how to use ASP.NET session state to store and retrieve values for a user session, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). 您可以取代使用的自訂實作管理工作階段狀態的介面。You can replace the with a custom implementation of the interface that manages session state. 如需自訂的工作階段狀態模組的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時，會建立物件。An object is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 物件會呼叫建構函式建立應用程式的物件。The object calls the constructor to create the object for the application. 應用程式組態中所指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

span.span: Executes final cleanup code before the object is released from memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時，會建立物件。An object is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 物件會建立並初始化應用程式和呼叫物件方法時釋放物件。The object creates and initializes the object for the application and calls the method when the object is released. 應用程式組態中所指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event End As EventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結尾的要求會引發事件時已呼叫方法，或當工作階段已過期。The event is raised at the end of a request when the method has been called or when the session has expired. 工作階段到期時所指定的分鐘數沒有要求正在進行工作階段，會將傳遞屬性。A session expires when the number of minutes specified by the property passes without a request being made for the session. **Session_OnEnd**事件用來執行任何清除工作的工作階段所使用的資源處置，例如工作階段。The **Session_OnEnd** event is used to perform any cleanup work for a session such as disposing of resources used by the session. 您可以指定的處理常式事件，藉由新增名為公用的副程式**Session_OnEnd** Global.asax 檔案。You can specify a handler for the event by adding a public subroutine named **Session_OnEnd** to the Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > **Session_OnEnd**事件就會只時，支援工作階段狀態屬性值是，這是預設值。The **Session_OnEnd** event is only supported when the session-state property value is , which is the default. 如果工作階段狀態設定為或是，則**Session_OnEnd** Global.asax 檔案中的事件會被忽略。If the session-state is set to or , then the **Session_OnEnd** event in the Global.asax file is ignored. 如果工作階段狀態屬性值是，然後對**Session_OnEnd**事件由自訂工作階段狀態存放區提供者。If the session state property value is , then support for the **Session_OnEnd** event is determined by the custom session-state store provider. 雖然事件是公用，您可以藉由加入 Global.asax 檔案中的事件處理常式，只處理它。Though the event is public, you can only handle it by adding an event handler in the Global.asax file. 這項限制實作，因為效能會重複使用執行個體。This restriction is implemented because instances are reused for performance. 工作階段的到期時間，只有**Session_OnEnd**執行 Global.asax 檔案中指定的事件，以防止呼叫程式碼相關聯的事件處理常式目前正在使用的執行個體。When a session expires, only the **Session_OnEnd** event specified in the Global.asax file is executed, to prevent code from calling an event handler associated with an instance that is currently in use. 如需 Global.asax 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱[Global.asax 語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582)。For more information about the Global.asax file, see [Global.asax Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用 Global.asax 檔案的內容**Session_OnStart**並**Session_OnEnd**定義的事件。The following code example shows the contents of a Global.asax file with the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events defined. ```vb ``` ```csharp ```

ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時建立。An is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 物件會呼叫方法時，它會建立應用程式的物件。The object calls the method when it creates the object for the application. 應用程式組態中所指定的類別。The class is specified in the configuration for an application.

span.span: The attribute in the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) configuration element is set to and the attribute is empty or does not exist.

exception.span: -or- The attribute in the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) configuration element is set to and the provider identified by name in the attribute has not been added to the [providers Element for sessionState (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/219d6778-9fb8-48ac-810d-bec68cf7d6aa) sub-element.

span.span: -or- The attribute in the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) configuration element is set to and the provider identified by name in the attribute has not been added to the [providers Element for sessionState (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/219d6778-9fb8-48ac-810d-bec68cf7d6aa) sub-element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Start As EventHandler

summary.span: The event that occurs when a session is created.

span.span: The event that occurs when a session is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動新的工作階段時，引發事件之要求的開頭。The event is raised at the beginning of a request when a new session is started. 如果要求不包含工作階段識別碼、 工作階段識別項無效，或工作階段識別碼相關聯的工作階段已過期，就會啟動新的工作階段。A new session is started if a request is made that does not contain a session identifier, the session identifier is invalid, or the session associated with a session identifier has expired. **Session_OnStart**事件用來執行任何初始設定工作的工作階段，例如設定工作階段變數的預設值。The **Session_OnStart** event is used to perform any initialization work for a session such as setting up default values for session variables. 您可以指定的處理常式事件，藉由新增名為公用的副程式**Session_OnStart** Global.asax 檔案。You can specify a handler for the event by adding a public subroutine named **Session_OnStart** to the Global.asax file. 如需 Global.asax 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱[Global.asax 語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582)。For more information about the Global.asax file, see [Global.asax Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用 Global.asax 檔案的內容**Session_OnStart**並**Session_OnEnd**定義的事件。The following code example shows the contents of a Global.asax file with the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events defined. ```vb ``` ```csharp ```
